Name: Parasight: Chlorophyll worms
About the game: Paraisght Prologue Parasight Prologue is the first chapter of the full game. In the prologue, you will find out about the game's story, gameplay, combat system, etc... You can choose between 6 classes and shape up the attribute of your protagonist and start your adventure! In the game, you have an inventory, and you can equip a lot of various weapons, armours, rings, and many more! Story Maximilie goes to the jungle to play with her friend. She was playing with his friend peacefully. When she was on her way to return to her house, she saw a strange plant that she had never seen before. Maximilie wants to find out what it is, but suddenly...!!! If you want to know the rest of the story, Download the prologue and play it now! Features: You can choose to play peacefully or aggressively! Choose between 6 classes of Knight, Mage, and some more! Dynamic story. Rich story & richer side stories! Cool puzzles and mini-games! Many cute NPCs. Original Art and soundtrack
